page.title: 08Hair Washing.
page.content: When I am going to have my hair washed, I fill my bucket of water up to the rim. Then I call my mum to wash my hair I have to bend over the top of the bath and wait until my mum to come and put the water upon my hair. It takes a short time for my mum to do that. I closed my eyes so that the water doesn't go in my eyes. I like it when my mum puts the shampoo on. Then my back starts to ache, and then I call out to my mum and say that my back is aching. And she would say that I must move forward then, and so I would. Then she puts in the conditioner. I put a towel round my neck and she starts to rub.
